name: Cownty Hunter
description:
Let loose your inner child and try to tip the most amount of cows! 
Hunt down your special cow for bonus points!

Play with up to 4 players.
We recommend you play this game with controller.

Game was made by:
- Dave Van Verdegem
- Vital Van Hollebeke
- Rufus Steels
- Inez Van Zwol

We made this game for the DAE Crea Week Game Jam.

Enjoy!
